Title: Soorarai Pottru
Writer: Sudha Kongara (story), Shalini Ushadevi (screenplay), Sudha Kongara (screenplay), Vijay Kumar (dialogue), Aalif Surti (additional screenplay), Ganeshaa (additional screenplay)
Actors: Suriya, Madhavan, Paresh Rawal, Aparna Balamurali
Plot: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.
